channel.title: Adding 525 animations on the 317
channel.description:
[COLOR="Red"]Welcome to this thread![/COLOR]
[I]I haven't done RuneScape Private Servers since i resigned from cleaner. So instead of letting this die im going to release it, since soulsplit got my paypal limited after they paid so this will piss them off as well.
And also for my good friend GaryKing who keeps asking me for it[/I]
Feel free to PM/Post errors or for help
Lets start. [B][I]Step 1.[/I][/B] Add all these files to your client(there at downloads). -Class20 -Class23 -Class36 -Class18
[B][I]Step 2.[/I][/B] Open class36. Edit this code. [CODE] public static byte[] getData(int i1 , int i2){ if(i1 == 0) return FileOperations.ReadFile("LOCATION/frames/"+i2+".dat"); else return FileOperations.ReadFile("LOCATION/skinlist/"+i2+".dat"); }[/CODE] Replace LOCATION/ To where you want to add the Skinlist and frames.
[B][I]Step 3.[/I][/B] Add the folders Frames - SkinList To where you want
[B][I]Step 4.[/I][/B] Add the seq and spotanim to ur cache
[B][I]Step 5.[/I][/B] Compile And run!!
____________________
Bug fixes.
[B]Fix #1[/B] [I]If you use a clean 317 deob delete this. [code]if(class30_sub2_sub3.anInt1419 == 1 && class30_sub2_sub3.aByteArray1420 != null) Class36.method529(class30_sub2_sub3.aByteArray1420, false);[/code] This should work.[/I]
[B]Fix #2[/B] [I] Error "readShort2() missing" Add to class Class30_sub2_sub2 [code] public int readShort2() { anInt1406 += 2; int i = ((aByteArray1405[anInt1406 - 2] & 0xff) << 8) + (aByteArray1405[anInt1406 - 1] & 0xff); if(i > 60000) i = -65535+i; return i; } [/code] [/i] More will be posted when you post them.
____________________
FAQ.
[B]Question: Graphics dont have models![/B] [I]Answer: Add the new 525 models[/I]
[B]Question: Models dont work on these graphics!![/B] [I]Answer: Add the new model format[/I]
[B]Question: Were can i get a list of these anims/graphics?[/B] [I]Answer: I have no idea[/I]
[B]Question: Were can i get the new model format?[/B] [I]Answer: I'm releasing this soon.[/I]
[B]Question: Can i add custom animations?[/B] [I]Answer: Not yet.[/I] ____________________
Download links of files: (frames,Skinlist,Class20,class23,class36,class18) [url=http://www.upload.ee/files/815006/Release.rar.html]http://www.upload.ee/files/815006/Release.rar.html[/url] ____________________
Have fun !

item.title: Adding 525 animations on the 317
item.dc:creator: @wolfs_goal wolfs goal
item.description:
@wolfs_goal wrote:

OMFG, do not hate…

Like for real, There wasn’t an NPC Update or anything, all you really need to do is find a 474 Emote list and there you go. The only new things in a 525 were claws, and maybe the teleport, punch, teletab, and that…God Fucking haters, get off your lazy ass and google for emote codes for once.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding 525 animations on the 317
item.dc:creator: @Destruction Destruction
item.description:
@Destruction wrote:

[quote=“dutchboy, post:13, topic:360854”][quote author=Destruction link=topic=457146.msg3347818#msg3347818 date=1284953669]
Non-renamed fails.
[/quote]
how does it fails? its exact the same as renamed, renamed only has other names for variables. other than that its the exact same client[/quote]

You can’t understand ANY of the ints in non-renamed clients which makes renamed clients much more easier to use.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @SWAT SWAT
item.description:
@SWAT wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=moparclient link=topic=457146.msg3347135#msg3347135 date=1284919170]
worked on first attempt
[/quote]
It didn’t work at all.

His SpotAnim class has errors, as well as the Class36.

The Seq.dat and spotanim.dat makes the players invisible.

The animation ids are all incorrect, so if you do this, you will have to redo all your animations. (walking, running, attacking, weapon animations, emotes, etc.)[/quote]

You must be really fucking stupid then

item.title: Adding 525 animations on the 317
item.dc:creator: @SWAT SWAT
item.description:
@SWAT wrote:

[COLOR=“Red”]Welcome to this thread![/COLOR]

[I]I haven’t done RuneScape Private Servers since i resigned from cleaner.
So instead of letting this die im going to release it, since soulsplit got
my paypal limited after they paid so this will piss them off as well.

And also for my good friend GaryKing who keeps asking me for it[/I]

Feel free to PM/Post errors or for help

Lets start.
Step 1.
Add all these files to your client(there at downloads).
-Class20
-Class23
-Class36
-Class18

Step 2.
Open class36.
Edit this code.

public static byte[] getData(int i1 , int i2){ if(i1 == 0) return FileOperations.ReadFile("LOCATION/frames/"+i2+".dat"); else return FileOperations.ReadFile("LOCATION/skinlist/"+i2+".dat"); }
Replace LOCATION/ To where you want to add the Skinlist and frames.

Step 3.
Add the folders Frames - SkinList To where you want

Step 4.
Add the seq and spotanim to ur cache

Step 5.
Compile And run!!

Bug fixes.

Fix #1
[I]If you use a clean 317 deob delete this.

if(class30_sub2_sub3.anInt1419 == 1 && class30_sub2_sub3.aByteArray1420 != null) Class36.method529(class30_sub2_sub3.aByteArray1420, false);
This should work.[/I]

Fix #2
[I]
Error
“readShort2() missing”
Add to class Class30_sub2_sub2

    public int readShort2()
    {
        anInt1406 += 2;
        int i = ((aByteArray1405[anInt1406 - 2] & 0xff) << 8) + (aByteArray1405[anInt1406 - 1] & 0xff);
		if(i  > 60000)
		i = -65535+i;
		return i;
    }

[/i]
More will be posted when you post them.

FAQ.

Question: Graphics dont have models!
Answer: Add the new 525 models

Question: Models dont work on these graphics!!
Answer: Add the new model format

Question: Were can i get a list of these anims/graphics?
Answer: I have no idea

Question: Were can i get the new model format?
Answer: I’m releasing this soon.

Question: Can i add custom animations?
Answer: Not yet.

Download links of files:
(frames,Skinlist,Class20,class23,class36,class18)
http://www.upload.ee/files/815006/Release.rar.html

Have fun !

Read full topic
